Description: Painting in water based pigment on printed Italian military paper depicting the flight into Egypt. Mary rides a donkey with the infant Christ on her lap, to the left is Salome and the the right, leading the donkey, is Joseph. Joseph carries a stick to which two gourds are attached. Above the holy family are two angels. Verso; Salome, Joseph and Mary are shown sleeping while the infant Christ suckles, his eyes open. Above is an angel who points down to Joseph. Framed with a paper mount.
Curator's comments: Previously part of a book of images used as models for mural paintings. These were made by an Ethiopian priest who was producing paintings and murals in the 1940s.
Acquisition notes: "Acquired from a mural painter 1/2 Day's drive from Addis Ababa" from label found with paintings.
